akn:content.akn:p:
§ 18815. Report The Secretary annually shall submit to Congress and make publicly available a report on the progress made in advancing smart manufacturing in the United States. (Pub. L. 117–58, div. D, title V, § 40535, Nov. 15, 2021, 135 Stat. 1071.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Wage Rate RequirementsFor provisions relating to rates of wages to be paid to laborers and mechanics on projects for construction, alteration, or repair work funded under div. D or an amendment by div. D of Pub. L. 117–58, including authority of Secretary of Labor, see section 18851 of this title.
